Words: Hi, how are you?
IPA: haɪ, haʊ ɑr ju?

Words: How can I help you?
IPA: haʊ kæn aɪ hɛlp ju?

Words: Do you want to eat here or to go?
IPA: du ju wɑnt tu it hir ɔr tu goʊ?

Words: May I help you?
IPA: meɪ aɪ hɛlp ju?

Words: How many people do you have?
IPA: haʊ ˈmɛni ˈpipəl du ju hæv?

Words: For how many?
IPA: fɔr haʊ ˈmɛni?

Words: What would you like today?
IPA: wʌt wʊd ju laɪk təˈdeɪ?

Words: Do you want to take some drinks
IPA: du ju wɑnt tu teɪk sʌm drɪŋks

Words: Something to drink?
IPA: ˈsʌmθɪŋ tu drɪŋk?

Words: Here you are!
IPA: hir ju ɑr!

Words: Yes of course! I bring it to you right now.
IPA: jɛs ʌv kɔrs! aɪ brɪŋ ɪt tu ju raɪt naʊ.

Words: The toilet is at the end of the hallway.
IPA: ðə ˈtɔɪlət ɪz æt ði ɛnd ʌv ðə ˈhɔlˌweɪ.

Words: I recommend the Grilled fish of the day.
IPA: aɪ ˌrɛkəˈmɛnd ðə grɪld fɪʃ ʌv ðə deɪ.

Words: I recommend the Steak with chips or salad.
IPA: aɪ ˌrɛkəˈmɛnd ðə steɪk wɪð ʧɪps ɔr ˈsæləd.

Words: I recommend the Sausage and roast tomato pasta.
IPA: aɪ ˌrɛkəˈmɛnd ðə ˈsɔsəʤ ænd roʊst təˈmeɪˌtoʊ ˈpɑstə.

Words: I recommend the Chicken salad with garlic yogurt dressing.
